metadata.title: YG - Event organization, brand activation, decoration
metadata.description: Specializing in providing event organization services, brand activation, marketing, design - decoration... in the Vietnamese market. With a team of experienced personnel in the field and dedication in each project, YG is ready to accompany customers in creating unique values full of inspirational creativity from emotions.

Page.text: We are a company specializing in providing event organization services, brand activation, decoration, and more. With a young, enthusiastic, and creative team, led by experienced individuals in the field, YG constantly affirms its unique identity, fostering the innovative mindset and youthful energy to bring true value to every task we perform for our clients.
Page.textP: Let YG accompany you and create unique value by building an inspiring journey of creativity through emotions.
Page.address: 181/37/2A Phan Đang Luu, Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh city
Page.name: Name
Page.slide4P1: YG provides services and optimizes customer requirements based on the 4C model in marketing:
Page.slide4P2: Customer Solution - Customer Cost - Convenience - Communication
Page.slide4P3: We are committed to delivering effective,
Page.slide4P4: creative, and unique solutions based on collaboration, responsibility, and emotional value.
Page.clientDescription: We are proud to partner with top brands across various industries:
Page.clientIndustries: FMCG, Food & Beverages, Education, Pharma & Cosmetics, Real Estate, Consumer Electronics, Automotive, Finance...
Page.event1: Young Chef Competition Ho Chi Minh City 2024 - Wilmar CLV
Page.event2: Teacher Appreciation Ceremony 11/20 - Starlit Touchpoint - Asian-European Career Orientation
